fr.sorbonne_u.cps.smartcity.descriptions

Class SmartCityDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.smartcity.descriptions.SmartCityDescriptor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicSimSmartCityDescriptor

    public abstract class SmartCityDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    The class SmartCityDescriptor defines all of the necessary information for the CEP system to interact with the smart city simulators.

    Description

    To ease the access to the information from everywhere in the program, all of the variables and methods in this class are declared as static members. Hence, there is no need to instantiate this class and pass an object reference everywhere.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2022-01-11

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      protected static class  SmartCityDescriptor.AbstractAsset
      The abstract class AbstractAsset defines the common data and methods for assets in the smart city and its simulator.
      protected static class  SmartCityDescriptor.FireStation
      The class FireStation describes a fire station in the city and its simulation.
      protected static class  SmartCityDescriptor.SAMUStation
      The class SAMUStation describes a SAMU station in the city and its simulation.
      protected static class  SmartCityDescriptor.TrafficLight 
      protected static class  SmartCityDescriptor.Zone
      The class Zone defines a zone in the city.

      • distance

        public static double distance(java.lang.String stationId1,
                              java.lang.String stationId2)
        return the distance between the two given stations.

        Contract

         pre     (isValidFireStationId(stationId1) && isValidFireStationId(stationId2)) || (isValidSAMUStationId(stationId1) && isValidSAMUStationId(stationId2))
 post    return >= 0.0
        Parameters:
        stationId1 - identifier of a first station.
